textContent.label: Fay Al Reeman II
textContent.description: Fay Al Reeman II is an exclusive beachfront community comprising 1 to 4BR luxury apartments featuring a pristine 1.4 km white sandy beach.
textContent.about:
A loft-type apartment features an open living/dining/kitchen space and a bathroom on the lower floor and a bedroom with a bathroom and a balcony on the upper floor. An average area amounts to 141 m2

.
  • 1-bedroom apartment of 162 m2 total area costs AED 2,600,000.
  • 2-bedroom apartment of 170 m2 area priced for AED 4,000,000.
  • 3-bedroom apartment of 287 m2 area evaluates AED 5,900,000.
  • 4-bedroom apartment of 533 m2 area evaluates AED 9,600,000.

The apartments are put in place unfurnished, with built-in wardrobes.

Mamsha AL Saadiyat properties ensure:

  • covered parking;
  • concierge service and security;
  • swimming-pool and gym;
  • barbecue areas;
  • white-sand beach.

The development plan of the project implies not only a great variety of options for retail, dining and entertainment, bit also landscaped spaces for strolling and wandering along.
